meanings.definition: To surpass in dancing skill or performance.
meanings.sent1: She was outdancing everyone at the dance recital.
meanings.sent2: The professional dancer was outdancing all the other contestants.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was outdancing the dog with its playful moves.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements were outdancing the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent5: The outdancing duo wowed the audience with their synchronized routine.

meanings.definition: To outperform in a dance competition.
meanings.sent1: He practiced hard to ensure he would be outdancing his competitors.
meanings.sent2: The talented dancer was outdancing her opponents effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The robot thought it was outdancing the humans in the dance-off.
meanings.sent4: Her energy on the dance floor was outdancing all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The outdancing couple took home the trophy with their flawless routine.
